SELECT
'碎矿' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '挡矿皮上%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '首轮驱动滚筒轴承润滑%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '托辊%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '上、下%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '皮带%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '电机与减速机%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '电机、减速机%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '减速机内润滑油油质%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '减速机内润滑油位%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a9'
FROM (SELECT SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN SC_CONTENT="电机轴承温度" THEN RESULT WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' WHEN (ALTPID=1 OR ALTPID=2) THEN CONCAT(RESULT,'故障') ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备" AND devName="2#皮带运输机")
AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as tmp

SELECT
'生产' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '皮带尾轮%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '皮带运行%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '皮带逆止器%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '皮带减速机%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '机台%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '皮带下矿%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a6' FROM ( SELECT devName,SC_CONTENT,SC_PART, ( CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN ALTPID=0 THEN '正常' else RESULT END
)tempResult from dxj_spot_result
where DEPT_NAME = '碎矿生产' and devName='2#皮带运输机' AND TO_DAYS(TASKSTART_TM)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) )as tmp

SELECT '电仪' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT ='有无异常' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4' FROM ( SELECT SC_CONTENT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN (SC_CONTENT="测振" OR SC_CONTENT="测温") THEN RESULT WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult, RESULT
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="电仪工段" AND devName="2#皮带运输机电机") AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now()) -- 当天数据 )as temp
